de.systemagmbh.common.html
Class CSysHtmlPageWriter

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.common.html.CSysHtmlPageWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSysHtmlConverter
Deprecated. As of release 2.5, replaced by de.systemagmbh.tools.text.html.CSysHtmlPageWriter

public class CSysHtmlPageWriter
extends Object
implements ISysComponent

Based on a PrintWriter, the class HtmlPageWriter makes the creation of correct formatted HTML 4.0 documents much easier and safer. It supports Lists and Tables of different origin.

Example: 



CSysHtmlPageWriter html=new CSysHtmlPageWriter();
html.setProperty("filename","test.html");
html.setProperty("documenttitle","main test");
html.setProperty("pagetitle","test - Table");
html.setMetaInformation("author","test autor");
try
{
    html.startFile();
    html.startDocument();
    html.writeTitle();
    html.writeTable(new de.systemagmbh.table.CSysPropertyTable(System.getProperties()));
    html.endDocument();
    html.endFile();
}
catch (Exception ex)
{
    ex.printStackTrace();
    ... 
}
...

Meta-information may be used freely. It is included in the file, but does not have a visual effect. The following properties on the other hand are set with setProperty and are important:

key default affects description
filename -- Writer The file to create (usually ending with .html.
cellspacing 1 Table Spacing between cells.
border 0 Table The border width of tables.
cellpadding 4 Table Padding of table cell contents
tableheadingcolor #00ffff Table Background color of table heading
footnote Systema copyright notice Document The footer of the page, e.g. a copyright notice.
headnote nothing Document The header of the page, e.g. a Company logo or a slogan.
charset windows-1252 Html Page character encoding.
textcolor #000000 Html Color of ordinary text (defaults to black).
bgcolor #FFFFFF Html Color of text background (defaults to white).
linkcolor Html Color of links (browser defaults).
vlinkcolor Html Color of vlinks (browser defaults).
alinkcolor Html Color of alinks (browser defaults).
background -- Html Background image default: none.
documenttitle untitled Html The title showing in the browser caption.
pagetitle pagetitle Document The Title writeTitle() will write
allowscript -- Document Define this to have javascript modification date

Version:
$Revision: 1.14 $
Author:
Herbert Helmstreit

Deprecated. 
Starts writing to the OutputStream out. All outputs of the HtmlPageWriter go to this stream, until the endFile() command.

Parameters:
out - an OutputStream, where outputs of the HtmlPageWriter go to.

endFile

public void endFile()
Deprecated. 
Closes the file after flushing the stream. No output is possible, unless startFile() is called again.

Deprecated.

startDocument

public void startDocument(String documenttitle)
Deprecated. 
Starts writing a html Document by creating the header - section and starting the body. If you want some Meta-Data to be included in the header, call setMetaInformation() first. If you want to modify body properties, use setProperty()

Parameters:
documenttitle - The tile displayed in the Browser caption

Deprecated. 
Ends writing a html document by closing the body - section. Additionally a tiny java - script showing the time of last modification is embedded.
